channel.title: SolPi - Cardano Stake Pool on Solpi
channel.description: Recent content in SolPi - Cardano Stake Pool on Solpi

item.title: About
item.description: I am a passionate software engineer. As a hobby I am maintaining my ada pool. I try to be an example in saving our planet and pushing climate neutrality, by living vegetarian, reducing Co2 footprint, supporting the right projects and adding awareness to the people I get in touch with. The first step is getting aware and changing your own habits.

item.title: Mission
item.description: By running our pool on 100% renewable energy, we are providing our delegators a chance to earn rewards and support our planet at once. With your delegation, you support climate change! Support us, make a difference, drive climate change, help to change for the better by adding awareness and doing the next step in the right direction. We donate 10% of our profits to seaspiracy.org to save our oceans. Another 10% of our profits we donate to c-Innovations to spread their products and their innovative technology stack on carbon-neutral and carbon-reducing devices to make this planet a better place.
